events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I ordered.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item received by the customer.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the product you received incorrectly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund promptly?
Thank you for the quick reply. My order number is 123456789, and I’ve attached a photo clearly showing the item I received differs from my order.
We have reviewed your photo and order details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and send you a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
I appreciate your prompt help and am happy to receive the refund and return label without hassle. Thank you for resolving this quickly.
Your refund has been processed, and you should receive an email with the return shipping label shortly. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and return label, and to check if there is anything more we can assist you with.
As you have confirmed receipt of the refund and return label, we are now closing your case. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey to let us know how well we handled your refund request and overall support experience.
